Didnt X clear out a mineshaft with a bunch of mob spawners to turn into a string farm?

comments_since_last_sample.body: Glad to see you’re feeling better now!
My guy forgot about waterlogged trapdoors for the spider farm lmao

Could have used waterlogged trapdoors. That's my go-to for these situations since the aquatic update. Also can take advantage of pack spawning by placing 5 strings from the top spawning platform all the way around. Gnembon explains it in his enderman farm and iskall uses it in his guardian farm.
Can anyone tell me the mod
Which vanilla tweaks pack is the spawning spheres one?
Didnt X clear out a mineshaft with a bunch of mob spawners to turn into a string farm?
Actually you have a little less spawning spaces... spider require 2x2 space, so it's 4 times less...
*Do we tell him that he could've used trapdoors or...?*
Hey if you extend the roof on the spider farm I think you will increase rates!👍
In the words of Edward Nygma, "That is grand-scale cheating, Batman!"
There is nothing wrong just a suggiestion. You could also use waterligged trapdoors next time its just a bit cheaper
Fun fact. Founded is a proper word, it just means that you have established something (usually done in the context of a town, nation or organisation)

Cmiiw but wasnt there a time where the hermits cleared out a mineshaft and then left the spawners behind. Wouldn't that be a little bit better?
